sen.j: 福知山市営バス（ふくちやましえいバス）は、京都府福知山市で運行されているコミュニティバス。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama Municipal Operation Bus is the community oriented bus operated by Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture
The Fukuchiyama Municipal Operation Bus is the community oriented bus operated by Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: The Fukuchiyama Municipal Operation Bus is the community oriented bus operated by Fukuchiyama City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 福知山市へ編入された旧3町が運営していた町営バスを引き継いだもの。
sen.e: This bus route was handed over to Fukuchiyama City from three towns of this area, when those towns were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City.
This bus route was handed over to Fukuchiyama City from three towns of this area, when those towns were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City.
This bus route was handed over to Fukuchiyama City from three towns of this area, when those towns were incorporated into Fukuchiyama City.

sen.j: 旧町営バスの各路線とも、民間バスや旧国鉄バスの路線撤退を受けた廃止代替バスである。
sen.e: All of the former town bus services had replaced the former private bus services and the former National Railway bus service, when those bus services were discontinued by those companies.
All of the former town bus services had replaced the former private bus services and the former National Railway bus service, when those bus services were discontinued by those companies.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: All of the former town bus services had replaced the former private bus services and the former National Railway bus service, when those bus services were discontinued by those companies.

sen.j: ここに挙げた以外にも、変則系統がある。
sen.e: There are also some irregular bus routes other than the ones described in this article.
There are also some irregular bus routes other than the ones described in this article.
There are also some irregular bus routes other than the ones described in this article.

sen.e: The origin of this bus route is the former Oe-cho Municipal Management Bus, which was handed over from the former Kyoto Transport Co. Ltd.
